channel.title: How i make this commands donator+

item.title: How i make this commands donator+
item.dc:creator: @kenvanbael kenvanbael
item.description:
@kenvanbael wrote:

if (cmd[0].equals(“teletome”)) {
String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)];
if (p2 != null) {
p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, “You have been Teleported to " + p.username);
p2.setCoords(p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel);
}
}
if (cmd[0].equals(“teleto”)) {
String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(” ") + 1));
Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)];
if (p2 != null) {
p.setCoords(p2.absX, p2.absY, p2.heightLevel);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You Teleport to " + p2.username);
}
}
}

         if (cmd[0].equals("ipban")) {

String tehnub = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
Player lel = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(tehnub)];
if (lel != null) {
lel.appendIPBan();
SocketListener.loadBannedHosts();
lel.disconnected[0] = true;
BufferedWriter bw = null;
}

if (cmd[0].equals(“item”)) {
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));

if (cmd[0].equals(“maxie”)) {
p.skillLvl[3] = 9999999;
p.frames.setSkillLvl(p, 3);
p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
p.updateReq = true;
}
if (cmd[0].equals(“unmute”)) {
p.muteType = 0;
p.muteExpect2 = true;
}
if (cmd[0].equals(“mute”)) {
p.muteExpect = true;

if (cmd[0].equals(“pnpc”)) {
p.npcType = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);
p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
p.updateReq = true;

Read full topic
